alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; Lancaster; Mathews; Middlesex; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 01 at 10:11PM EDT until September 02 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...One half foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Lancaster, Gloucester, Middlesex, Mathews, York, Newport News and Hampton/Poquoson Counties. * WHEN...Through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is possible in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. WINDMILL POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.1 FT, MAJOR 2.6 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/01 AM 2.9 1.5 1.1 1 NONE 02/01 PM 2.9 1.5 1.0 1 NONE 03/02 AM 2.7 1.3 1.0 1 NONE 03/02 PM 2.8 1.4 1.0 1 NONE 04/02 AM 2.5 1.1 0.9 1 NONE 04/03 PM 2.7 1.3 0.9 1 NONE WARE RIVER AT SCHLEY VA MLLW CATEGORIES -
